trans-unit.source: Creates and maintains the <xref href="System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore"></xref> sub-element of the service behaviors section of a Sql workflow configuration file.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Configuration.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement"></xref> class.
Gets the type of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior"></xref> object.
A type object.
Gets or sets the connection string to the database server.
Examples of connection string contents include provider, data source, instance store database, and integrated security information.
A string that contains information about the connection to the instance store database.
Gets or sets a named connection string to the database server.
An example of a named connection string is "DefaultConnectionString".
A string name that represents a connection to a database server.

Returns a new object of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior"></xref> that contains property settings for a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Configuration.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement"></xref>.
An generic object that contains workflow configuration element property settings.
Gets or sets the time period in which the host must renew the lock on an instance.
If the host does not renew the lock in the specified time period, the instance is unlocked and may be picked up by another host.
A timespan object that represents the lock renewal period.
Gets or sets whether workflow instance data is kept in the persistence store after the workflow instance completes or if it is deleted at that point.
The enumerated actions consist of deleting the instance data from the persistence store or not deleting the instance data from the persistence store, when the instance has completed its operation.
An enumeration of the actions that can occur when an instance completes.
Gets or sets the optional property that specifies how compression is used for instance data.
Possible values for this property are "None", which specifies no compression, and "GZip", which specifies that instance data is compressed and uses the gzip algorithm.
An option that determines the manner in which data compression is performed, if at all.
Gets or sets the action that occurs in response to an exception that is thrown when a workflow instance is locked.

Examples of the resulting <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Configuration.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement.InstanceLockedExceptionAction%2A> responses can include graceful shutdown and overlapped recycling of app domains, as well as failover and recovery from host failures.
An action response to an exception thrown.
Gets or sets the maximum number of SQL connection retries.
The default value is 4.
An integer representing the maximum number of SQL connection retries.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod"></xref> property.

Specifies the time period after which the SQL Workflow Instance Store runs a detection task to detect any runnable or activatable workflow instances in the persistence database after the previous detection cycle.
Returns the time interval.
